attributes.action: Privatise the Tube and the EUUKL if this has not been done already
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These two firms combined are worth so much that most if not all of Britain's public debt, which now accounts for 43% of GDP, could be paid if these two firms were privatised. Please sell ALL government-owned shares of them if you still have any.
